WorkItem.Description:
My latest Filters for Rawr. Allows you to select professions and filter out for almost any situation for pre-raid and planning. Also includes a quick switch that lets you see everything in the database so you do not have to search for where it is in the filters. By default all profession items are disabled, but if you have that profession, just enable it to show the BOP items when you view crafted items. No more missing out on an item because it was lost in the current Rawr filters, this one filters it all. Even filters gems and only show BOP gems if you enable jewel-crafting as you profession.
Any problems, just let me know and they are as good as solved.

Comments.Message: Latest remake of my filters, any suggestions or comments would be nice.
More Options and better filters. Ant problems, just let me know.
If you'd like to post this as a Patch to replace our current filter system please do, this isn't really an "issue" per say.

Well it kinda is, the current filter system tends to loose information and that can lead to items not being found. As for the posting here, I did not see any contact information to send it anywhere else. If it would need to be listed anywhere else or perhaps directed to someone else, please let me know.
Patches are located on the Source Code Tab, up top there's a selection to Upload New Patch
